!!runintermux.text: in the currently running emulator use the adb shell and run-as com.termux to communicate from cli of this device make sure to export paths which is needed for running termux command

!!termuxexport.text:
# Termux prefix (installation root)
export PREFIX=/data/data/com.termux/files/usr

# Home directory for Termux
export HOME=/data/data/com.termux/files/home

# Add Termux binaries to PATH
export PATH=$PREFIX/bin:$PATH

# Python and other libraries
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$PREFIX/lib

# Locale (optional, avoids some Python/UTF-8 issues)
export LANG=en_US.UTF-8

rundroidrun.text: @installdroidrun.sh  and then push it to github then access termux via adb cli and do a git pull and run the updated script dont stop until droidrun is installed via this script  critical: the installation must be done through this script for fututr automation purpose. in case of error explain it to me wait for my suggestion for fix then make the fix in code in cursor and repeat the process

showlogs.text: dont use params like --tail or 2>1& or >app.log etc. just show the logs in the terminal
